casebody.data:
J. L. H. ROUNTREE and Donald C. Duke, Plaintiffs-Appellants Cross-Appellees, v. VARCO INTERNATIONAL, INC., Defendants-Appellees Cross-Appellants. No. 78-2157. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. April 24, 1980. Oscar Nipper, Houston, Tex., for plaintiffs-appellants cross-appellees. Arnold, White & Durkee, Houston, Tex., William P. Green, Los Angeles, Cal., for defendants-appellees cross-appellants.

Before THORNBERRY, FRANK M. JOHNSON, Jr. and HENDERSON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

AFFIRMED on the basis of the opinion of the district court (Judge Robert O’Conor, Jr.), Rountree v. Varco International, Inc., 486 F.Supp. 3 (S.D.Tex. 1978).
